thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 3 of 3553
thread.title: Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text:
Finding Thrift Books was purely by chance on my part, and like so many others, I was also extremely skeptical, until I gave them a try.
I'm very impressed with the endless collection of books, pricing, quality, delivery, and all around customer service.
Thrift Books is a paradise for book lovers, and I only have one small problem.
I need more book shelves. ;)
I highly recommend to all family and friends!
